div.div: Cells were seeded at 1-2×10 6 cells in 12 well plates and incubated for 2 h, then treated with (10, 25 and 50 μg/mL) concentrations of PREO for 24 h. Stained cells were protected from light until they were evaluated on flow cytometry, which was performed using an Epics XL-MCL flow cytometer.
